branding.tagline: Relive your favourite animes, page by page

publishing_focus.primary_focus: Adaptations of anime series into webtoon format
publishing_focus.target_audience: Anime fans, predominantly teens and young adults
publishing_focus.competitive_advantage: Our unique collaborations with anime studios enable us to create faithful adaptations that resonate with fans
publishing_focus.example_titles: Titles based on animes like 'Attack on Titan' and 'My Hero Academia'; authors similar to Hajime Isayama
